headline: GE Vernova & AT&T outlook, bitcoin & crypto gains: Trending Tickers
summary: Brad Smith and Madison Mills take a closer look at some of the trending tickers of today's trading session on Wealth. GE Vernova (GEV) maintains its full-year outlook despite a $300–$400 million impact from tariffs. AT&T (T) also reaffirmed its guidance as subscriber numbers grew, supporting the company's assertion that it is well-positioned amid economic uncertainty. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) is trading above $90,000, lifting other crypto-related stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Strategy (MSTR), MARA (MARA), and Robinhood (HOOD). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
